# Mayor and Council

  [![Corvallis Monogram Logo](images/432f72f6ed5089181f024d5c1c58c05e1c81ec4a9760c9782ea9528013fd4a07.png)](https://www.corvallisoregon.gov/sites/default/files/styles/gallery500/public/imageattachments/directory/18222/corvallis_monogram_png.png?itok=faLNFw09)  Phone Number:  541-766-6900 Email:  mayorandcouncil@corvallisoregon.gov 

Use this email address to reach the Mayor and all 9 Councilors at once.

 __Dislaimer:__ All emails sent to the City of Corvallis are considered public records and may be open to inspection by the public at any time.

 *  [![Printer-friendly version](images/f5e752edd4c7f331145fae1030db0dabaaf89cfe96952ea73d3c61518d1cd5f3.png)](https://www.corvallisoregon.gov/print/18222)

|---|---|

|[Jim Moorefield](https://www.corvallisoregon.gov/directory-listing/jim-moorefield)|Ward 3 City Councilor|
|[Ava Olson](https://www.corvallisoregon.gov/directory-listing/ava-olson)|Ward 4 City Councilor|
|[Charlyn Ellis](https://www.corvallisoregon.gov/directory-listing/charlyn-ellis)|Ward 5 City Councilor & Council Vice President|
|[Alison Bowden](https://www.corvallisoregon.gov/directory-listing/alison-bowden)|Ward 6 City Councilor|
|[Paul Shaffer](https://www.corvallisoregon.gov/directory-listing/paul-shaffer)|Ward 7 City Councilor & Council President|
|[Carolyn Mayers](https://www.corvallisoregon.gov/directory-listing/carolyn-mayers)|Ward 8 City Councilor|
